item.title: Charge your iPhone while also using a 3.5mm jack simultaneously
item.description: Belkin, a company known for its mobile accessories, has introduced a new adapter called the 3.5 mm Audio + Charge RockStar for iPhone models 8, 8 Plus, X, 7, and 7 Plus. This adapter allows users to charge their iPhones and listen to audio through 3.5 mm headphones simultaneously. The adapter connects to the iPhone’s Lightning connector and supports data syncing, microphone use, and remote control functionality through the headphone jack.
